scripts.start: yarn codegen && yarn build:local && yarn remove:local && yarn create:local && yarn deploy:local
scripts.deploy:local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 loreum-nft --version-label v0.0.1 --network localhost
scripts.deploy:goerli: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ xhad/loreum-nft subgraph.yaml --network goerli
scripts.deploy:mainnet: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ looksrare/aggregator subgraph.yaml --network mainnet
scripts.deploy:studio: graph codegen subgraph.yaml && graph build subgraph.yaml && graph deploy --studio loreum-nft --network mainnet
